QuestData.Title: Beachfront Property
QuestData.Description: It's time for Venomspite to expand!$B$BWe'll take care of the Onslaught in due time, but I want you to spearhead our efforts on the Forgotten Shore. The property value has outstanding potential and just look at that view!$B$BUnfortunately, there's an infestation of human ghosts, shipwrecked crews and the like who haven't quite realized that they're dead.$B$BClear the beach and the waters off the shore, and maybe you and I will talk about building a cozy, new mausoleum down there soon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Surveyor Hansen, just north of the Forgotten Shore, has asked you to slay 20 Forgotten ghosts.
QuestData.CompletionText: Why is it that I doubt your sincerity when you suggest that you've done all that you can to clear the shore of those ghosts?
QuestData.RewardText: Can't you just see it now, $c? It'll be the vacation spot of Northrend!$B$BWhat do you think of the name, "Hansen's Cove", or maybe "$n Bay"? Kind of catchy, don't you think?
